title: Indonesia: export value of vaccines for human medicine | Statista
author: Hanadian Nurhayati-Wolff; Jul
description: In 2021, the export value of vaccines for human medicine from Indonesia amounted to around 91 million U.S.
cleaned_text: Export value of vaccines for human medicine Indonesia 2012-2021 [In 2021, the export value of vaccines for human medicine from Indonesia amounted to around 91 million U.S. dollars. In the same year, the total](#statisticContainer) [export value of pharmaceutical products from Indonesia](/statistics/1234122/indonesia-export-value-of-pharmaceutical-products/)amounted to approximately 556 million U.S. dollars.
